oval_definitions.xsi:schemaLocation: http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#unix unix-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#independent independent-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#unix unix-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#linux linux-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#windows windows-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5#macos macos-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-definitions-5 oval-definitions-schema.xsd http://oval.mitre.org/XMLSchema/oval-common-5 oval-common-schema.xsd

metadata.description: The kernel is installed

metadata.title: UEFI system boot mode check
metadata.description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

metadata.title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
metadata.description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

metadata.title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
metadata.description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

criterion.comment: Identification provider is set to ldap within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

metadata.title: The ufw is disabled on the system
metadata.description: The ufw service should be disabled.

criteria.comment: package ufw removed or service ufw is not configured to start
service is not present or not configured
service ufw is not configured to start

criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service ufw is masked

metadata.title: The nftables is disabled on the system
metadata.description: The nftables service should be disabled.

criteria.comment: package nftables removed or service nftables is not configured to start
service is not present or not configured
service nftables is not configured to start

criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service nftables is masked

metadata.title: The firewalld is disabled on the system
metadata.description: The firewalld service should be disabled.

criteria.comment: package firewalld removed or service firewalld is not configured to start
service is not present or not configured
service firewalld is not configured to start

criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service firewalld is masked

metadata.title: SELinux status check
metadata.description: Check if System has SELinux enabled.

metadata.title: Running kernel has fips mode enabled
metadata.description: Check if sysctl crypto.fips_enabled = 1

metadata.title: Test that the architecture is x86_64
metadata.description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is x86_64

metadata.title: Test that the architecture is s390x
metadata.description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is s390x

metadata.title: Test for different architecture than s390x
metadata.description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

metadata.title: Test that the architecture is aarch64
metadata.description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel is aarch64

metadata.title: Operating System is rhel
metadata.description: The installed operating system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux

criterion.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux
The operating system Red Hat Enterprise Linux of version not equal 9.0 is installed

metadata.title: Operating System is rhel
metadata.description: The installed operating system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux

criterion.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux
The operating system Red Hat Enterprise Linux of version less than or equal 8.4 is installed

metadata.title: Remote NFS file system mount is defined
metadata.description: At least one remote NFS file system mount is defined in /etc/fstab

metadata.title: Kerberos workstation is older than 1.17-18
metadata.description: Check if version of Kerberos workstation is lesser than 1.17-18

criteria.comment: Kerberos workstation version is lesser than 1.17-18

criterion.comment: Check if version of Kerberos workstation is lesser than 1.17-18

metadata.title: Kerberos server is older than 1.17-18
metadata.description: Check if version of Kerberos server is lesser than 1.17-18

criteria.comment: Kerberos server version is lesser than 1.17-18

criterion.comment: Check if version of Kerberos server is lesser than 1.17-18
check if ipv6.disable argument is correct in GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX
check if ipv6.disable parameter is defined in /etc/default/grub

metadata.title: Mountpoint /var is active (mounted) or configured in /etc/fstab

criterion.comment: The path /var is an active (mounted) mount point
The path /var is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

metadata.title: Mountpoint /var/tmp is active (mounted) or configured in /etc/fstab

criterion.comment: The path /var/tmp is an active (mounted) mount point
The path /var/tmp is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

criterion.comment: The path /var/log is an active (mounted) mount point
The path /var/log is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

The path /var/log/audit is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

The path /tmp is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

The path /srv is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

The path /opt is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

criterion.comment: The path /home is an active (mounted) mount point
The path /home is a mount point configured in /etc/fstab

metadata.title: Check if the environment is a OSBuild pipeline
metadata.description: Check the value of environment variable container.

criterion.comment: Check the value of container variable

metadata.title: Check if the scan target is a machine
metadata.description: Check for absence of files characterizing container filesystems.

extend_definition.comment: If environment is not a container, it is machine

metadata.title: Check if the scan target is a container
metadata.description: Check for presence of files characterizing container filesystems.

metadata.title: WiFi interface is present
metadata.description: Checks if any wifi interface is present.

metadata.title: Package grub2 is installed
metadata.description: Checks if package grub2-common is installed.

criterion.comment: Test if OPAL is not used

metadata.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS RHEL9 Based
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS RHEL9 Based

metadata.title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

metadata.title: Oracle Linux 7
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Oracle Linux 7

extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

metadata.description: Bootable container or bootc system

ind-def:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family

lin-def:systemdunitproperty_test.comment: Test that the ufw service is not running
Test that the nftables service is not running
Test that the firewalld service is not running
Test that the service ufw is not found
Test that the service nftables is not found
Test that the service firewalld is not found
Test that the property LoadState from the service ufw is masked
Test that the property LoadState from the service nftables is masked
Test that the property LoadState from the service firewalld is masked

unix-def:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter crypto.fips_enabled set to 1

ind-def:textfilecontent54_test.comment: VERSION_ID in os-release is not equal 9.0
VERSION_ID in os-release is less than or equal 8.4
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 9.0
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 8.7
VERSION_ID in os-release is less than 7.4
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 9.0
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 8.7
at least one nfs is defined

lin-def:rpminfo_test.comment: Kerberos workstation version is lesser than 1.17-18
Kerberos server version is lesser than 1.17-18

ind-def:environmentvariable58_test.comment: environment variable container is set to bwrap-osbuild

ind-def:textfilecontent54_test.comment: SSSD Configuration is set to use LDAP

lin-def:systemdunitproperty_object.comment: Retrieve the ActiveState property of ufw
Retrieve the ActiveState property of nftables
Retrieve the ActiveState property of firewalld
Retrieve the LoadState property of ufw
Retrieve the LoadState property of nftables
Retrieve the LoadState property of firewalld
